mapper.insert: insert into freeboard (idx, name, password, subject, content, notice, ip) values (freeboard_idx_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{password}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{notice}, #{ip})
mapper.update: update freeboard set hit = hit + 1 where idx = #{idx}
update freeboard set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, notice = #{notice} where idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: select * from freeboard where notice = 'on' order by idx desc
